content: we created this sea glass pattern for the minnesota shop hop 2023 under the sea theme this simple shoulder cozy is perfect to throw over a t-shirt or tank-top in the summertime dressy enough for a wedding or make it casual wear it multiple ways yarnovers become buttonholes in this special one-skein project our shop hop is a great way to help the community around us we collected $4000 to donate to our local food shelf open cupboard in oakdale minnesota yay hoppers yarn used was trippin with dixi sport merino/silk 328 yards order yarn or kit with beads here http //dscreationlbrandt homestead com/~shop/main html
